results.title: Potential biomarkers and therapeutic targets for obsessive compulsive disorder: Evidences from clinical studies
results.text_hl: Similarly, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, used for the treatment of @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ has been hypothesized to elicit potentially beneficial effects against @<m>DISEASE_Obsessive_Compulsive_Disorder</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009771 @@@OCD@@@.

citations.NLM: Sultania A, Venkatesan S, Batra DR, Rajesh K, Vashishth R, Ravi S, Ahmad F. Potential biomarkers and therapeutic targets for obsessive compulsive disorder: Evidences from clinical studies Biochem Med (Zagreb). 2024 Feb 15;34(1):010503. PMID: 38125619
